_meanings:
A particle of affirmation
or certainty (indeed, truly, 
forsooth), but it is generally used as
an expletive; {#Apo vE narasUnavaH#}  
<ls>Ms. 1. 10</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">2. 231</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 49</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">11. 78.</ls> &c.
It is also said to be a vocative
particle, and sometimes shows 
entreaty or persuasion ({#anunaya#}).
